item.title: Formal Notice sent to Rachel Rossi, Director of the Office for Access to Justice at the DOJ
item.description: Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2024-03-05_2115_0800_formal_notice_rachel_rossi_doj_Redacted.pdf From: Vincent B. Le Corre Subject: 18 U.S. Code § 4 - FORMAL NOTICE: DO NOT IGNORE Date sent: March 05, 2024, 21:15 +0800 (China Standard Time), March 05, 2024, 08:15 -0500 (Eastern Standard Time) To: Rachel Rossi (Director of the Office for Access to Justice) Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2024-03-05_2115_0800_formal_notice_rachel_rossi_doj_Redacted.pdf Dear Ms. Rossi, Please be advised that this communication constitutes a formal notice under 18 U.
